name: Billy Botus
description:
In order for this game to play properly, click on the Fullscreen button on the bottom right. 

Billy Botus is a game where you play as a robot with many features.

But as the game goes on you have to detach parts of the robot to open doors and pass through areas, losing that ability for a period. Use your other abilities to pass through the level and reach the end!
The game was made by:
Alex Nascimento - Programming and Music
Tiago Sambatti - Game and Level Design
Vitor Laskowsky - Art and Animation
